name: Journal (itch) (Skylar)
description:
Three characters are trapped in a different realm and your job is to try help them come back to Earth. All characters need to survive and the game can only be played once. If any of the characters die, the game ends.

Since this game is part of my dissertation research, it was divided in two chapters and I need you to answer to two questionnaires.

When start playing, please maximise the game. After finishing the first chapter, please reply to the first questionnaire:

https://forms.gle/xfKiSxTecR394nvx9

Before starting the second chapter, start recording your screen and then press the "continue" button. Good luck trying to save the characters!

When you die or finish the second chapter, please reply to the second questionnaire:

https://forms.gle/LVuxuVJmnBuH9cTQ6

Controls

Left mouse button to click and drag.

Team

Text revision by Sonja Zimmermann.

Testing by Kyle Mcalinden.

Music by Francis Wells & Lennon Hutton.
